title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/16/21
itunes:title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/16/21
description:
George Noory and Washington Post investigative reporter Craig Whitlock explore the American leaders and military experts who have been attempting to win the war in Afghanistan since the terrorist attacks of 2001, and if facts presented to the public were distorted to continue the war.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
